name: shore-up
effect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP.  During a sandstorm, the healing is increased to ⅔.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.

The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.

The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.

The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.
